text: A () is a French word describing a situation where three persons are involved in a relationship and live together. Each of the three has a sexual relationship to the two others. A form of polyamory, arrangements are sometimes identified as a throuple,Throuple Relationships vs Threesomes Explained: What It's Like To Be In A Three-Person Romance, HuffPost, 2016 July 28. thruple, or triad. In 2021, the first ever throuple got married, and it is now officially legal. ==References== Category:Human sexuality
title: Ménage à trois
